import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import getCartAction from '../Store/Action/Get_Cart_Action' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const My_Cart = () => { const [itemAddedToCart, setitemAddedToCart] = useState() const dispatch = useDispatch() const logintoken = localStorage.getItem("logintoken") useEffect(() => { if (logintoken) { getCartAction(dispatch, {}) } }, [dispatch]) const getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) // console.log(getCartdata) return (<>

demo

{/*

1 item in your cart

Taxes may apply for certain state
Oppo Oppo Hot 11S ₹10,000.00 ₹11,000.00
Total ₹ 10000
*/} ) } export default My_Cart
